Same here. That’s why we start by naming our 50 nominees, all of which are worthy of celebration in their own right. Check back on September 17 to find out which of these spots made it to the final Hot 10 list. (And while you’re thinking about it, save the date for our extremely epic Hot 10 party in NYC on October 19. Buy tickets now!)Photo by Noah FecksAddaLong Island City, NYPowerful, purposeful, firing-on-all-cylinders Indian hitsPhoto by Elizabeth CecilAleppo SweetsProvidenceBest-in-class baklava at a homey Syrian caféPhoto by Alex LauAtomixNew York CityThis is Korean-inflected fine dining at its, well, finest.Photo by Laura MurrayBalkan Treat BoxSt. LouisWood-fired flatbreads, sandwiches, and other extreme forms of deliciousnessPhoto by Jonnie SirotekBeckonDenverDuncan Holmes ups the ante with a chef’s counter next door to last year’s Hot 10 winner Call.Photo by Alex DelanyBenchwarmers BagelsRaleigh, NCEvery other bagel sandwich just became meaningless.Photo by Johnny AutryBenne on EagleAsheville, NCNew Southern with deep roots from chef Ashleigh ShantiPhoto by @rhodeisland_eatsBig KingProvidenceChef James Mark’s one-of-a-kind Japanese hideawayPhoto by Hayden SpearsBlood Bros.
